mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member ( userid , password, username, nickname, email, phone, postcode, road_address, details_address ) values ( #{userid} , #{password}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{postcode} , #{roadAddress}, #{detailsAddress} )
mapper.update: update tbl_member set password = #{password}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, postcode = ${postcode}, road_address = #{roadAddress} , details_address = #{detailsAddress}, moddate = now() where userid = #{userid}
